job.title: Java Software Engineer-Web Services-Senior Level
job.description: Purpose of JobbrbrWe are currently seeking talented Java Software Engineers  Sr Level for our Phoenix AZ facility for teams inside our Chief Administrative Office groupbrbrUSAA Java Software Engineers  Web Services create and maintain APIs for our business software applications that our members use Done well many may never realize or appreciate how critical these APIs are or how weve made them simpler Faster Safer Yet they help make our members lives better Its a great challenge and responsibilitybrbrHere you will invent Youll design and test Youll take risks Youll create new technology but the impact youll make on our members will be far more significantbrbrJob RequirementsbrbrAs a Java Engineer  Web Services you are expected to be able to function in a fastpaced environment driving innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative development ensuring quality is built into all solutions leveraging TDD Your responsibilities will require you to be an expert in API development You will lead teams of developers guiding on engineering and architecture best practices as well as demonstrate the ability to influence and engage with other engineers and architects You will work closely with business clients and UI designers to analyze user requirements design and code applications and customize andor integrate commercial software packages for both internal employees and external memberfacing applications across multiple platformsbrbrAs a Java Engineer  Web Services it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and quality as well as ensure application architecture is designed for performance and resiliencybrbrstronguAbout USAAbrbrustrongUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelbrbrUSAA Careers  World Class Benefits 31 secondsbrbrstronguPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliUtilizing technical expertise Creates system requirements performs design and analysis and coding and unit testing of complex to highly complex system functionality andor defect correction across multiple platforms Identifies ideas to improve system performance and impact availability Resolves complex technical design issuesliliProvides functional andor technical guidance in evaluating applications systems or evaluating requests for proposals Coordinates changes and influences and prioritizes tasks with business or technical departmentsliliAnalyzes and influences technical system andor user requirements Identifies and creates solutions to improve system performance and availability Facilitates root cause analysis of system issues to minimize impact and future occurrencesliliCreates system documentationplay books and serves as a lead technical reviewer and contributor in requirements design and code reviews Typically serves as a resource to the businessliliDevelops accurate estimates on work packages and ensures the accuracy of estimates developed by less experienced internal and third party team members Analyzes and designs specifications for less experienced internal and third party team members to execute Acts as a technical resource throughout the development life cycle May also actively contribute to the technical and soft skills development of team membersliliAssists team leads and management with delegation of technical work packages to crossfunctional and third party team members for execution through the full development life cycle Keeps management appropriately informed of progress and issuesliliCoordinates system application transition from development teams to maintenance and production teams andor constructs and implements necessary controls to assure systemapplication traceabilitybrliulWhen you apply for this position you will be required to answer some initial questions This will take approximately 5 minutes Once you begin the questions you will not be able to finish them at a later time and you will not be able to change your responsesbrbrstronguMinimum RequirementsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in related field of study or 4 additional years of IT experience beyond the minimum required in lieu of a degree liliAND 6 years of software engineeringdevelopment experience utilizing Java with 2 years experience working with RESTful Web ServicesliliDemonstrated ability to independently research technical issues and generate creativeinnovative solutionsbrliulstronguPreferred Experiencebrustrongulli4 years in REST frameworks with focus on API developmentlili2 years in AGILE methodology Scrum Lean SAFe etclili2 years experience with JavaScriptlili2 years experience integrating with backend services like JMS J2C ORM frameworks Hibernate JPA JDO etc JDBCliliExperience with event driven frameworks such as Kafka RabbitMQ or IBM MQliliExperience building APIs with Spring BootliliAbility to design and implement container based APIs using container frameworks like OpenShift Docker or KubernetesliliRelational Database design and optimization with Oracle DB2 MySQL or PostgreSQLliliUnderstanding of microservices architecture design and implementationliliWorking experience with Gradle GIT GitHUB GITLab etc around continuous integration and continuous delivery infrastructureliliCloud infrastructure application development with vendors like AWS Google or MicrosoftliliExperience testing in REST servicesliliExperience in design and develop automated tests and frameworksbrliulThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobbrbrstrongCompensation strongUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 106800  192300 this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work locationbrbrEmployees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsbrulliGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averagebrliulstrongShift premiumstrong will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursbrbrstrongBenefits strongAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs Additionally our career path planning and continuing education assists employees with their professional goalsbrbrPlease click on the link below for more detailsbrbrstrongUSAA Total RewardsbrbrstrongstrongRelocationstrong assistance is strongavailablestrong for this position
